All essential elements except N were supplied from the soil adequately, but two types of N fertilizers were used for supply of enough N nutrition need including slow release N fertilizer, and Urea. Chemical composition of used various fertilizers were analysed according to standard methods
28, 29 . The amount of N application was determined based on the differences of plant N requirement and soil N, according to fertilizer type. In this study 50 (less than adequate), 100 (moderate), and 150 (adequate) mM N were provided from each fertilizer types. Slow release fertilizer used in this study, was invited based on a novel composition at science and technology center of Hamedan province, Iran and registered at Iranian Patent Office, Tehran on Jan. 30, 2017 (patent number 139550140003013815).
